text: Simon Cowell has been rushed to hospital in an ambulance after an accident in his London home. According to The Sun, he was stretchered out of his mansion in a neck brace after an ambulance was called at 8am this morning. The music mogul, 58, allegedly fainted and fell down the stairs while fetching a cup of hot milk. He was kept in hospital for tests before returning home in the afternoon. Giving a thumbs - up on his doorstep, he cast doubt about whether or not he would appear on The X Factor this weekend, the first live show of the series. ` ` I will be back but I don't know about tomorrow,'' he said.
